Class AbstractArgumentExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.web.support.AbstractArgumentExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArgumentExtractor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CasArgumentExtractor, DefaultArgumentExtractor, GoogleAccountsArgumentExtractor, OpenIdArgumentExtractor, SamlArgumentExtractor

    public abstract class AbstractArgumentExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArgumentExtractor
    Abstract class for handling argument extraction.

    3.1.2
